Denlelush.text: My best purchase of the month!
Denlelush.product_name: Processor Intel Core i7 14700KF LGA1700 OEM

Kirill.text: The company is great, I want to work here...

Andrew.text: They were supposed to get an iPhone 15 PRO MAX, but they were given an iPhone XR instead.
Andrew.product_name: Processor Intel Core i5 11600KF LGA1200 OEM

Andrew.text: I'll come back here for more shopping sometime!

Olga.text: The MSI MPG B550 GAMING PLUS motherboard works perfectly with my Ryzen CPU. Highly recommend!
Olga.product_name: Motherboard MSI MPG B550 GAMING PLUS

Ivan.text: Good prices and fast shipping, but customer support could be better.

Elena.text: The Sapphire AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT NITRO+ is a beast for gaming. Great performance!
Elena.product_name: Video card Sapphire AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT NITRO+

Andrew123.text: It's a cool company, but it's a pity that the price tags are sometimes unavailable...
